alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 12:51PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Burke, Calhoun, west central Clarendon, Barnwell, Bamberg, southeastern Lexington, southwestern Sumter, southeastern Aiken and Orangeburg Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Sandy Run to near Savannah River Site. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Barnwell, Bamberg, Denmark, Savannah River Site, Plant Vogtle, Brookdale, Williston, Blackville, St. Matthews, Elloree, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Orangeburg County Airport, Barnwell State Park, Edisto Gardens, Swansea, North, Springfield and Hilda. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 125 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter
